content.title: Add to Cart Button
content.description: A button for adding items into the shopping cart.

content.title: Availability Subscriber
content.description: Shows the availability subscriber form when a product isn't available.

content.title: Back To Top Button
content.description: Store component's block that redirects users to the top of the page when clicked on.

content.title: Breadcrumb
content.description: Navigation scheme that shows a user's browsing history up to their current location in your store.

content.title: Buy Button
content.description: Button responsible for adding products in the minicart.

content.title: Category Menu
content.description: Shows the store's department list on an customizable menu.

content.title: Drawer
content.description: Designed for Mobile devices, this app renders a sliding drawer for the store's menu.

content.title: Iframe
content.description: Renders external iframes on your store.

content.title: Image
content.description: Render an pre-defined image on the UI.

content.title: InfoCard
content.description: Store component's block that displays content combining image and a markdown text.

content.title: Locale Switcher
content.description: Component responsible for changing the current language of the store.

content.title: Login
content.description: Handles every functionality related to user login.

content.title: Logo
content.description: Store component's block that displays an image logo for the store's header.

content.title: Menu
content.description: Renders the Menu component, displaying a bar containing links and drop-down sub-menus.

content.title: Minicart
content.description: Fetching data from the Checkout OrderForm API, the Minicart component displays a summary list of all items added by customers in their shopping cart.

content.title: Newsletter
content.description: Store component's block that dStore component's block that displays a newsletter form.

content.title: Notification
content.description: VTEX Notification component

content.title: Order Placed
content.description: Renders the the orderPlaced page with all order data.

content.title: Pickup Availability
content.description: Enables users to verify the availability for in-store pickup regarding the selected SKU

content.title: Product Availability
content.description: Store component's block that that display messages for users regarding the product availability in the inventory.

content.title: Product Brand
content.description: Store component's block that displays either the name or the logo of a product's brand.

content.title: Product Customizer
content.description: Allows a product's attachments to be made available and ready to be chosen by users from the product page.

content.title: Product Description
content.description: Store component's block that displays the product's description.

content.title: Product Gifts
content.description: This app's blocks are responsible for displaying, in the Product Description block, all gifts available for a given product.

content.title: Product Identifier
content.description: Shows a product identifier, such as the product reference, product ID, sku EAN or sku reference.

content.title: Product Images
content.description: Store component's block that renders the product's image.

content.title: Product Kit
content.description: Displays a list of product kits.

content.title: Product List
content.description: Works with Minicar to display all items in the user's cart, informing when some of them are unavailable.

content.title: Product Name
content.description: Store component's block that renders the product's name.

content.title: Product Price
content.description: The app exports blocks related to the product's price, such as list price, selling price and savings.

content.title: Product Quantity
content.description: Allows users to a add a chosen amount of the displayed product in their cart.

content.title: Product Specifications
content.description: Store component's block that renders the produt's specifications.

content.title: Product Specification Badges
content.description: Shows badges in the product page based on the product's specifications.

content.title: Product Summary
content.description: App responsible for summarizing product information (such as name, price and image) in other store blocks, such as the Shelf and the Minicart.

content.title: Product Summary Attachment List
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying the product's attachments in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary Brand
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying the product's brand in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary Buy Button
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying a Buy Button block in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary Description
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying the product's description in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary Image
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying the product's image in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary Name
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying the product's name in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary SKU Selector
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying the SKU Selector block in other store blocks.

content.title: Product Summary Specification Badges
content.description: This block is exported by the Product Summary app and it is responsible for displaying badges with the product's specifications in other store blocks.

content.title: Quickorder
content.description: Designed for B2B scenarios, it allows users to add multiple products to the cart at once.

content.title: Reviews and Ratings
content.description: VTEX native solution for product review and rating.

content.title: Rich Text
content.description: The Rich Text brings texts to your store and everything else that Markdown language is able to. It converts texts written in Markdown language and displays its content as HTML elements.

content.title: Sandbox
content.description: Allows building an arbitrary HTML content in extension points from an Iframe.

content.title: Search Bar
content.description: Store component's block that shows a search bar with autocomplete options and displays the matching products as well.

content.title: Search Result
content.description: Handles the result fetched by the VTEX Search API and displaying it to users. The app exports all store blocks expected in a search results page, such as the filters and the product gallery.

content.title: Seller Selector
content.description: Displays the number of sellers your marketplace has for each product, enabling users to compare prices from each one.

content.title: Share
content.description: Store component's block that allows to share a product URL via social medias.

content.title: Shelf
content.description: Displays a list of products in the store home page.

content.title: Shipping Simulator
content.description: Store component's block that estimates the shipping fee based on a zip code input.

content.title: SKU Selector
content.description: Store component's block that renders every SKU available for a given product.

content.title: Store Components
content.description: App responsible for providing main block themes, such as the SKU Selector and the Logo.

content.title: Store Footer
content.description: Displays your store's Footer.

content.title: Store Form
content.description: Provides blocks responsible for displaying an user form connected to Master Data through a JSON Schema.

content.title: Store Header
content.description: Displays your store's Header.

content.title: VTEX Store Link
content.description: Provides blocks responsible for displaying links in other theme blocks, such as the Product Summary.

content.title: User Address
content.description: VTEX UserAddress component

functional.title: Challenge Trade Policy Condition
functional.description: Challenge that checks if an user can access the current Trade Policy based on a specified condition rule.

functional.title: Checkout UI Settings
functional.description: App responsible for exporting scripts to build a custom Checkout UI.

functional.title: Store Sitemap
functional.description: App responsible for automatically generating a `sitemap.xml` file of your VTEX IO Store.

functional.title: Store Icons
functional.description: Exports all icons used by the store's components.

functional.title: Telemarketing
functional.description: Enables a call center operator impersonate a costumer in the store, and this app is used by store theme.

pixel.title: Alexa Certify Code
pixel.description: VTEX Alexa Certify Code native integration

pixel.title: Google Customer Reviews
pixel.description: VTEX Google Customer Reviews native integration

pixel.title: Google Search Console
pixel.description: VTEX Google Search Console native integration

pixel.title: Google Tag Manager
pixel.description: VTEX Google Tag Manager native integration

pixel.title: Order Sms Notification
pixel.description: VTEX Order Sms Notification native integration

layout.title: Condition Layout
layout.description: Allows a block rendering under pre-defined conditions.

layout.title: Flex Layout
layout.description: Builds a complex custom layout using the concept of rows and columns, setting the desired structure and positioning of blocks in a given page.

layout.title: Modal Layout
layout.description: Provides blocks that help you create modals in your store.

layout.title: Responsive Layout
layout.description: Declares layout structures that will only be rendered in a specific screen-size breakpoint.

layout.title: Overlay Layout
layout.description: Helps you create a Dropdown, Select or a Tooltip component.

layout.title: Slider Layout
layout.description: Flexible solution for building sliders of blocks within your store theme.

layout.title: Stack Layout
layout.description: Renders blocks on top of other blocks.

layout.title: Sticky Layout
layout.description: Provides layout structures to help building elements that should be fixed positioned.

layout.title: Tab Layout
layout.description: Builds custom tabbed layouts. In other words, it allows you to build the store layout using tabs.
